### Problem01

For every recursion, there are two main components that are _____(0)\___ _____(1)\___ , which returns a value without making any subsequent recursive calls, and _____(2)\___ _____(3)\___, which is the central part of a recursive function and relates the value of the function at one (or more) arguments to the value of function at one (or more) other arguments. (from sec-2.3).
